item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Wonder Announces Acquisition of Grubhub (63 points | 41 comments)
2. The Impact of Jungle Music in 90s Video Game Development (64 points | 14 comments)
3. Porygon Was Innocent: An epileptic perspective on the infamous Pokémon episode (14 points | discuss)
4. Graph-based AI model maps the future of innovation (26 points | 8 comments)
5. A Student's Guide to Writing with ChatGPT (16 points | 7 comments)
6. Watermark Anything (57 points | 20 comments)
7. Show HN: Konga Beat – A custom track editor for Donkey Konga 2 and 3 (54 points | 13 comments)
8. Play Dialog: A contextual turn-taking TTS model like NotebookLM Playground (14 points | 3 comments)
9. Netflix's Distributed Counter Abstraction (4 points | 1 comment)
10. MIT engineers make converting CO2 into useful products more practical (113 points | 93 comments)
11. My company has banned the use of Jetbrains IDEs internally (77 points | 51 comments)
12. Patterns (YC S21) Is Hiring to Transform Business Finance and Credit ( | hide)
13. From BSP to ESP – How S3ctor Abused Quake Editors to Redefine the Morrowind Mod (117 points | 38 comments)
14. The Broadband Phone (2021) (15 points | discuss)
15. Drone Relative Positioning (20 points | discuss)
16. New elliptic curve breaks 18-year-old record (41 points | 5 comments)

18. Fault Injection – Down the Rabbit Hole (34 points | discuss)
19. A Mathematician in a School of Art (68 points | 16 comments)
20. Teens learn a new conspiracy theory every week on social media (17 points | 7 comments)
21. Covering the Supreme Court and the Judiciary in (Mostly) Plain English (62 points | 55 comments)
22. We built a self-healing system to survive a concurrency bug at Netflix (311 points | 148 comments)
23. Show HN: A simple image puzzle generator (35 points | 22 comments)
24. Show HN: Bluetooth USB Peripheral Relay – Bridge Bluetooth Devices to USB (177 points | 97 comments)
25. Steve Jobs, NeXTSTEP, and early object-oriented programming (2016) (38 points | 10 comments)
26. Diffusion models are evolutionary algorithms (36 points | 6 comments)
27. Cornish monument is 4k years older than was thought and 'without parallel' (29 points | 7 comments)
28. Backdoor attempt on Exolabs GitHub repo through an innocent looking PR (54 points | 23 comments)
29. Study shows bats have acoustic cognitive maps (55 points | 15 comments)
30. How we built the Black Friday Cyber Monday 2023 globe (51 points | 7 comments)
